DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the differences of genotypes of hepatitis B and hepatitis C in Taiwan.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Hepatitis B and Hepatitis C in Taiwan
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is investigating the differences of genotypes and DNA level or RNA level of hepatitis B and hepatitis C in Taiwan.
DOC.criteria: Born before 1985/01/01 HBV or HCV carriers
